VIRUS Installed in XMLSpy2009. It Uninstalls into user temp directory, then copies msa.exe to WINDOWS DIRECTORY and makes changes to REGISTRY and creates a task in task scheduler. You have to open Task Scheduler, then click advanced and click Hidden Files to see hidden tasks.
